name: Der Lernball (read me please)
description: Sitting in bed tonight, tucking in my seven year old son, using this piece, I explained to him how animation was invented, and why film looks the way it does, and the history of moving pictures. His little mind was blown, he understood and was amazed that all those little circles he just watched me quickly draw, became a bouncing ball. A learning ball. This is a 1/1, and despite the lack of time or effort it took, this piece may mean the most to me out of any Iâ€™ve done. Twitter: @TheWaldorfJ
